health_categories.name: Excellent
health_categories.description: Outstanding performance across most metrics. This startup shows strong fundamentals and growth potential.

health_categories.name: Good
health_categories.description: Solid performance with room for improvement in some areas. Generally healthy trajectory.

health_categories.name: Average
health_categories.description: Mixed performance with significant areas needing attention. Moderate risk profile.

health_categories.name: Poor
health_categories.description: Multiple critical issues requiring immediate attention. High risk of failure.

health_categories.name: Critical
health_categories.description: Severe issues across multiple areas. Urgent intervention needed to avoid failure.
